backend/main.mo: Defines main canister actor with mixin-based storage, authorization, and extensive user, contribution, reward, and U.S. geography type definitions.
feature_evidence.json: Lists features, involved files, components, and test IDs for earned‑points toast and contribution‑logging behaviors.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten summaries describing purpose and functionality of numerous frontend files.
frontend/docs/ARCHITECTURE.md: High-level architecture document detailing Whisper’s vision, hierarchical installations, canister mapping, and modular subsystem design.
frontend/docs/COMPLAINT_CATEGORY_SUGGEST: Specification for complaint category suggestion system including backend storage arrays and location-based mapping.
frontend/docs/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment guide outlining prerequisites, configuration, and steps for deploying Whisper to ICP.
frontend/docs/HOMEPAGE_REDESIGN_NOTES.md: Notes describing homepage UX and visual redesign including hero section, contrast fixes, and typography updates.
frontend/docs/PHASED_PLAN.md: Outlines phased development of Whisper from core architecture to single‑installation prototype and later multi‑installation features, with clear deliverables and non‑goals.
frontend/docs/SECRETARY_NAVIGATION_HOOKS: Describes the registry system for registering navigation destinations so the Secretary assistant can route users via options, keywords, or deep links.
frontend/docs/SMOKE_TEST_INSTANCE_FOLLOW: Provides a full manual smoke test for instance creation, issue reporting workflows, task management, and regression checks.
frontend/docs/SMOKE_TEST_REGRESSION_PATC: Lists regression-focused smoke tests covering logo rendering, header styling, profile loading, navigation, Secretary flows, and base‑path deployment.
frontend/docs/SMOKE_TEST_SECRETARY_FLOWS: Defines smoke tests for the Secretary assistant's menu, discovery, issue reporting, custom categories, keyword routing, and error recovery flows.
frontend/docs/STYLE_GUIDE.md: Specifies Whisper’s visual design principles, color palette, typography, and accessibility guidelines.
frontend/index.css: Empty stylesheet placeholder for global styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the app root and loading the main frontend entry script.
frontend/public/whisper-logo-teal.svg: SVG file containing the teal Whisper logo graphic.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling routing via popstate, initializing React Query, and registering secretary navigation actions.
frontend/src/components/common/HomeHeade: Responsive header with navigation, authentication-aware menu items, and mobile menu handling.
frontend/src/components/common/IconBubbl: Reusable circular icon wrapper with configurable size and color variants.
frontend/src/components/common/LoadingIn: Shared spinner component with optional label and size variants.
frontend/src/components/common/LoginButt: Authentication button that triggers login/logout flows and displays status icons.
frontend/src/components/common/UserProfi: Dropdown menu showing user avatar, profile navigation, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/create-instance/: Form for creating a new instance with auto-generated names, geographic selection, validation, and proposal submission.
Dropdown for selecting a county based on a chosen state, with loading and error handling.
Dropdown for selecting a place within a county, loading data via useGetPlacesForCounty and handling errors and disabled states.
State selection dropdown that loads all states with useGetAllStates and displays errors or loading states.
frontend/src/components/issue-project/Is: Dialog showing issue project details, status, category, geography, and a tasks tab for a proposal.
Task list and creation UI for an issue project, supporting adding tasks, toggling completion, and logging contribution events.
frontend/src/components/proposals/Propos: Dialog displaying full proposal details with live data refresh and optional auto-opening of the related issue project view.
Section that lists all proposals with loading/error states and opens a detail dialog, also responding to secretary navigation events.
frontend/src/components/secretary/Secret: UI card prompting users to engage with the Secretary feature, with dismiss and open actions.
Provides a typeahead input with keyboard navigation and selectable location options, filtering and displaying matches as the user types.
Implements the main secretary chat UI, sending user messages to a brain engine and handling location selections and assistant responses.
Renders the SecretaryWidget into a global overlay portal and adapts keyword lookup behavior for parent consumers.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity, auto‑refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminContributionL: Fetches paginated admin-only contribution logs using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminUserContribut: Fetches contribution logs for a specific user principal, restricted to admin access.
frontend/src/hooks/useCallerContribution: Retrieves the authenticated caller’s contribution summary with identity-scoped caching.
Loads and saves the caller’s user profile with identity-scoped caching and mutation invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useComplaintSuggestio: Provides complaint category suggestions and full category lists based on US hierarchy level and search term.
frontend/src/hooks/useContributionEventL: Logs contribution events with client-side deduping, error normalization, and reward handling, updating summary caches accordingly.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateInstanceProp: Provides hooks to check instance name availability and submit new instance proposals with validation and React Query mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentPath.ts: Tracks the current route path using popstate events for SPA navigation updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Returns a debounced version of a value after a configurable delay.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeleteProposal.ts: Defines a mutation to delete proposals and invalidate related queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useHideProposal.ts: Defines a mutation to hide proposals and refresh moderation and proposal data.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a context and hooks to manage Internet Identity login, stored identity loading, and auth client setup.
Contains hooks to fetch, create, and update tasks for a proposal with error handling and optimistic updates.
Persists state in localStorage with SSR safety and syncs updates automatically.
frontend/src/hooks/useModerationItems.ts: Fetches admin moderation queue items and maps backend proposals into UI moderation objects.
frontend/src/hooks/usePreloadedImage.ts: Preloads an image URL and returns readiness and error state, resetting when the source changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides multiple React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, proposals, geography data, and admin status via the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useSecretaryChat.ts: Manages secretary chat state including messages, menu visibility, and reset actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useSecretaryNavigatio: Implements a registry for navigation destinations with keyword lookup and action execution.
frontend/src/hooks/useSetIssueProjectCat: Provides mutations and getters for setting and reading issue project categories stored temporarily in localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useUpdateProposalStat: Exposes a mutation to approve or reject proposals and invalidates related queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useUSGeography.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching states, counties, and places with error handling and caching.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base/theme variables and utility classes for light/dark modes and UI effects.
frontend/src/lib/contributionActionTypes: Exports canonical action type constants and type for contribution events.
frontend/src/lib/earnedPointsToast.ts: Implements a unified earned‑points toast with action‑specific messaging, chat variants, lockout, and optional cached totals.
frontend/src/lib/formatProposalGeography: Utilities to label, format, and assemble geography and population info for proposals.
frontend/src/lib/secretaryNavigation.ts: Defines Secretary navigation options with keyword matching and deep-link helpers.
frontend/src/lib/secretaryReportIssueDat: Fetches geography details and top issues for reporting, combining backend calls with fallbacks.
frontend/src/lib/secretaryTopIssuesMessa: Class that retrieves and formats top-issues messages for states, counties, and cities.
frontend/src/lib/uiCopy.ts: Centralized UI text strings for product, navigation, proposals, and other app sections.
frontend/src/lib/whisperInstanceNaming.t: Generates, validates, and parses WHISPER-prefixed instance names based on geography.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React, React Query, and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminModeration: Admin-only page that checks admin access and displays moderation items with login and error states.
frontend/src/pages/admin/components/Cont: Admin UI section for viewing global or user-scoped contribution logs with pagination and search.
frontend/src/pages/admin/components/Mode: Renders a table of moderation items with status badges and actions like approve, reject, hide, and delete.
frontend/src/pages/GeographyPage.tsx: Geography page UI displaying placeholder content and navigation back to home.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Profile page that loads, edits, and saves a user’s profile with image upload and contribution logging hooks.
frontend/src/secretary/brain/FlowEngineB: Implements the flow-engine-based secretary brain handling intents, slots, geography data, messaging, and navigation.
frontend/src/secretary/brain/hooks.ts: Utility helpers for composing and filtering flow event listeners, including no-op and console loggers.
frontend/src/secretary/brain/SecretaryBr: Defines the SecretaryBrain interface for handling input, actions, state, messages, typeahead, and listeners.
frontend/src/secretary/copy/secretaryCop: Provides fixed English UI strings and prompt templates for all Secretary menu, discovery, reporting, intent, and recovery flows.
frontend/src/secretary/copy/secretaryPro: Defines helper functions to format location names and build dynamic prompts, lists, and messages for Secretary interactions.
frontend/src/secretary/decisions/secreta: Contains pure decision logic for branching Secretary flows, including issue-flow routing, unknown input recovery, and geography/instance checks.
frontend/src/secretary/flow/flows.ts: Defines all Secretary conversation nodes and their view models, integrating static copy and prompt builders for menu, discovery, and issue-reporting flows.
frontend/src/secretary/flow/runner.ts: Implements the flow controller that processes actions, transitions nodes, emits events, and produces view models using node definitions.
frontend/src/secretary/flow/types.ts: Declares core types for nodes, actions, transitions, context, and view models used across the Secretary flow engine.
frontend/src/secretary/intent/flowRegist: Maps intents to their required slots and order, and exposes registration for navigation handlers within the slot-filling system.
frontend/src/secretary/intent/flowRunner: Implements slot-based flow execution for intents, including finding missing slots, prompting, filling values, and triggering completion navigation.
frontend/src/secretary/intent/geographyL: Performs backend-powered state, county, and place lookup from free text, returning the most specific geography match.
frontend/src/secretary/intent/geographyN: Provides client-side string-matching helpers to detect states, counties, and places in text and extract hierarchical geography info.
frontend/src/secretary/intent/index.ts: Barrel file exporting all intent, flow, repair, and geography utilities and types.
frontend/src/secretary/intent/intentClas: Rule-based classifier mapping normalized user text to supported Secretary intents using keyword patterns.
frontend/src/secretary/intent/repair.ts: Detects correction messages, identifies which slot to repair, and clears affected slots via dependents logic.
Manages slot storage including getting, setting, clearing, dependency resets, and detecting filled state.
frontend/src/secretary/intent/types.ts: Defines Secretary intents, slots, value types, and the slot bag used in mini-flow processing.
frontend/src/secretary/observability/sec: Lightweight in-memory trace logger for recording Secretary events with enable/disable controls.
frontend/src/secretary/state/secretaryCo: Creates and manages the Secretary conversation context, including slot resets, message handling, and flow state.
frontend/src/secretary/ui/secretaryViewM: Transforms internal node view models into UI-ready rendering instructions and resolves icon names.
frontend/src/utils/assetUrl.ts: Provides helpers to resolve asset URLs and join navigation paths with the app’s base path.
frontend/src/utils/secretaryProjectNavig: Implements event-based navigation for Secretary flows, allowing signaling and listening for project navigation events.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL parameters, persisting them in session storage, and managing hash-based params.
frontend/src/utils/userFacingError.ts: Maps backend error messages to concise, user-friendly strings for display in the UI.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, fonts, animations, and required plugins.
project_state.json: Project state describing requirements and progress for implementing earned-points toast feedback in the app.
